permissions: Allowed for admins or users with update permission on the target user.
side_effects: Creates a user language; if is-default is true, other user languages for the same user are updated to is_default=false by a database trigger.
validation_notes: --user and --language are required. --is-default expects true/false and is interpreted as true only when set to "true" (any other non-empty value is treated as false). A user can have only one user-language per language (unique user_id + language_id) and only one default language (unique user_id where is_default=true).

flags.name: --is-default
flags.validation: true/false; interpreted as true only when set to "true"
